body_html:
Thanks all! That was substantially smoother than last time.

@hawkinsp I don't think I'll have time to do the related TPU changes, so I'll leave that part to someone else. Specifically that means (1) turn on and test bfloat16 and (2) implement the integer case of tf.random.stateless_uniform.

body:
Thanks all!  That was substantially smoother than last time.

@hawkinsp I don't think I'll have time to do the related TPU changes, so I'll leave that part to someone else.  Specifically that means (1) turn on and test `bfloat16` and (2) implement the integer case of `tf.random.stateless_uniform`.
